name: Kay's Destiny
storyline:
In a world filled with magic and mistery, the monstrous army invades the Earth.
The young hero Kay is imprisoned by demons in a jail prison captured by men.
With the weight of the World on his shoulders he must escape, discover loyal friends in treacherous landscapes,
face powerful foes, unlock the mistery of the monstrous threat and defeat Evil.
Embark on a journey on finding the courage, confront the demons within and find the truth about Kay's Destiny.
summary:
A retro style indie JRPG with pixel art graphics and a live piano soundtrack.
Created by youtuber "KayThePianist".
